thread.title: Celebrities Eating Candy at Oscars 2017 - Meryl Streep, Taraji P Henson Eating Candy at Oscars 2017
thread.title_full: Celebrities Eating Candy at Oscars 2017 - Meryl Streep, Taraji P Henson Eating Candy at Oscars 2017

author: Lauren Alexis Fisher
title: Celebrities Eating Candy at Oscars 2017 - Meryl Streep, Taraji P Henson Eating Candy at Oscars 2017
text:
Last year, Oscar attendees were able to snack on cookies hand-delivered by Girl Scouts in the audience. This year, however, the snack of the evening was candy. Candy-filled parachutes that dropped from the ceiling, to be more specific. Host Jimmy Kimmel instructed the audience to close their eyes for a surprise treat when candy fell from the ceiling via plastic parachute bags:
It's raining candy at the #Oscars pic.twitter.com/t8nOTErcxK
â€” Variety (@Variety) February 27, 2017
 The bags were filled with boxes of classic candies like Junior Mints, Red Vines and more.
Pharrell was one of the lucky ones who caught a bag, but looked a little apprehensive (he probably still ate the Junior Mints though):
GIF Giphy
